course_title: Topics in Language and Culture: Argentine Medicine and Global Health
class_notes:
(Same as HLTH 385 903)
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 21 - June 16, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Advanced study of a topic related to the language, discourse, literature, and/or culture of the Hispanic world. Students may take multiple SPAN 385 courses provided that they focus on different topics.
